<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Credit Facility
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On October&nbsp;23, 2013, the Company entered into a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	credit agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Credit Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	) &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Wells Fargo Bank, National Association (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Bank
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	).&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On July 27, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Credit Agreement was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	amended to extend the maturity date and increase the size of the line of credit.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company entered into the Credit Agreement to enhance cash deployment flexibility.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:31.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As amended, t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he Credit Agreement provides for a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million unsecured revolving line of credit, under which the Company may borrow, repay and reborrow loans from time to time prior to its scheduled maturity date of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	July 27
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Maturity Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	).&nbsp;&nbsp;Proceeds of loans made under the Credit Agreement may be used for working capital and other general corporate purposes of the Company and its subsidiaries.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company may prepay the loans under the Credit Agreement in whole or in part at any time without premium or penalty, subject to customary breakage costs.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The loans bear interest at LIBOR plus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Any then-outstanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	principal amount, together with all accrued and unpaid interest, is due and payable on the Maturity Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company is required to maintain with the Bank average account balances, calculated on a quarterly basis, of not less than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$30.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company must also maintain EBITDA of not less than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$75.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million measured quarterly, and, in order to take certain actions such as payments of dividends, must also maintain a balance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$500.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million of cash and cash equivalents and marketable securities on a worldwide consolidated basis.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Credit Agreement contains other customary affirmative and negative covenants, as well as customa
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ry events of default
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<A NAME="LLTC-20160703X10K_HTM__CP_TEXT_1_324">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	In addition, the Company&#x2019;s ability to borrow under the Credit Agreement or other means of obtaining capital may be restricted by the terms of the Analog Merger Agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	To date, the Company has not utilized the Credit Agreement a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	nd w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in compliance with the covenants under this credit facility.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Pursuant to the terms of the Linear Merger Agreement, the Company&#x2019;s ability to borrow under the Credit Agreement cannot exceed $75 million without Analog Devices&#x2019; consent.&nbsp;&nbsp;As such, t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he Company&#x2019;s ability to borrow under the Credit Agreement or other means of obtaining capital may be restricted by the terms of the Analog Merger Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Stockholders&#x2019; Equity
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Stock Repurchase
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On October 16, 2012, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s Board of Directors authorized the Company to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	re
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	purchase up to&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	10.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million shares of its outstanding common stock in the open market over a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	-year time period.&nbsp;&nbsp;As this stock repurchase expired after the two-year time period, o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n October 14, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s Board of Directors authorized the Company to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	re
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	purchase up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	10.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million shares of its outstanding common stock in the open market over a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	-year time period.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the majority of restricted stock awards and units granted, the number of shares issued on the date the restricted stock awards and units vest is net of the minimum statutory tax withholding requirements that the Company pays in cash to the appropriate taxing authorities on behalf of its employees. The table below includes these withheld shares because they are treated as common stock repurchases in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Company&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	financial statements, as they reduce the number of shares that would have been issued upon vesting. In addition, the table below includes open market repurchases.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:39PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Analog Merger Agreement restricts the ability of the Company to repurchase shares of its common stock until the time that the transaction is consummated or the Analog Merger Agreement is terminated.
</FONT>
</P>

	A

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Retirement Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company has established a 401(k) retirement plan for its qualified U.S. employees.&nbsp;&nbsp;Under the plan, participating employees may defer up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of their pre-tax earnings, subject to the Internal Revenue Service annual contribution limits.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company contributes to qualified U.S. employees&#x2019; 401(k) accounts as part of the Company&#x2019;s semi-annual profit sharing payouts.&nbsp;&nbsp;Contributions made by the Company within the fiscal year to this plan were approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$11.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$11.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$9.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million in fiscal years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The provision for income taxes reconciles to the amount computed by applying the statutory U.S. Federal rate at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	35%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to income before income taxes for fiscal years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2016
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company has a gross state tax credit carryforward that do

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	es

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	not expire of

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$

	35.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

	The Company provided a full valuation allowance on the state credit carryforwards which are not likely to be utilized.

	&#xFEFF;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As of July 3, 2016, the Company has
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	gross

	federal and s

	loss carryforwards of

	$11.8

	million and

	$11.8

	million, respectively.&nbsp;The federal and state
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	net operating loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	carryforwards will expire&nbsp;at various dates from 2017 through 2030.&nbsp;The&nbsp;net operati
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ng
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	loss carryforwards&nbsp;are subject to an annual limitation as a result of the acquisition of Dust Networks by the Company, which constitutes a change of ownership as defined under Internal Revenue Code Section 382.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&#xFEFF;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company is subject to examination by the United States federal tax authorities for the tax years 2013 and later. State income tax returns are generally subject to examination for a period of three to five years after filing of the respective return. Foreign income tax examination period varies from jurisdiction to jurisdiction. Singapore has a statute of limita
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	tion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	years.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company is not currently under any signi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ficant tax returns examination.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The FASB issued ASU 2015-17,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Balance Sheet Classification of Deferred Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	which simplifies the presentation of deferred income taxes. This ASU requires that deferred tax assets and liabilities be classified as non-current. During the fourth quarter of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	fiscal year 2016 the standard was early adopted on a prospective basis. Adoption of this ASU resulted in a reclassification of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$49.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of current deferred tax assets to net non-current deferred tax liabilities in the Consolidated Balance Sheet as of July 3, 2016. No
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	prior periods
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	were retrospectively adjusted.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	The Company has a partial tax holiday in Singapore

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and Malaysia
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	whereby the local statutory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	rate is significantly reduced, if certain conditions are met. T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he tax holiday

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for Singapore

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	August 2019

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and the tax holiday
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	fo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	r Malaysia is effective through
</FONT>

	July 2025
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	&#xFEFF;

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	The impact of the Singapore and Malaysia tax holidays was to increase net income by approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>

	million

	, or

	&nbsp;

	$0.

	10

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per diluted share,

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in fiscal year
</FONT>

	2016

</FONT>

	$25.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$0.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per diluted share,

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in fiscal year

	2015

	, and

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$22.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$0.09
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per diluted share,

	in fiscal year

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company does not provide a residual U.S. tax on a portion of the undistributed earnings of its Singapore and Malaysian sub
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sidiaries, as it is the Company&#x2019;

	s intention to permanently invest these earnings overseas.&nbsp;&nbsp;Should these earnings be remitted to the U.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	S. parent then the

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	July 3, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the Company had $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	36.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	millio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n of unrecognized tax benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million if recognized, would favorably impact the effective income tax rate in future periods.
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2016

	includes accrued interest on unrecognized tax benefits totaling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

	8

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million.&nbsp;&nbsp;At

	Under the Analog Merger Agreement, the Company has agreed to pay a termination fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$490
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million to Analog Devices if the Analog Merger Agreement is terminated under certain circumstances, including termination by the Company to enter into a superior alternative transaction or following an adverse recommendation change of the Company&#x2019;s

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company is subject to various legal proceedings and claims that arise in the ordinary course of business on a wide range of matters, including, among others, patent suits and employment claims.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company does not believe that any such current suits will have a material impact on its business or financial condition.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, current lawsuits and any future lawsuits will divert resources and could result in the payment of substantial damages.
</FONT>

<EFX_AUDITORS_OPINION>
<A NAME="FIS_AUDITORS_OPINION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Report of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Board of Directors and S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	tock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	holders of Linear Technology Corporation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We have audited the accompanying consolidated balance sheets of Linear Technology Corporation as o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	f July 3, 2016 and June 28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, and the related consolidated statements of income, comprehensive income, stockholders' equity and cash flows for each of the three fiscal years in the period ended July 3, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our audits also included the financial statement schedule listed in the Index at Item 15(a)2. These financial statements and schedule are the responsibility of the Company's management. Our responsibility is to express an opinion on these financial statements and schedule based on our audits.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We conducted our audits in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States). Those standards require that we plan and perform the audit to obtain reasonable assurance about whether the financial statements are free of material misstatement.&nbsp;&nbsp;An audit includes examining, on a test basis, evidence supporting the amounts and disclosures in the financial statements.&nbsp;&nbsp;An audit also includes assessing the accounting principles used and significant estimates made by management, as well as evaluating the overall financial statement presentation.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe that our audits provide a reasonable basis for our opinion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In our opinion, the financial statements referred to above present fairly, in all material respects, the consolidated financial position of Linear Technology Corporation as of July 3, 2016 and June 28, 2015, and the consolidated results of its operations and its cash flows for each of the three fiscal years in the period ended July 3, 2016, in conformity with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles.&nbsp;&nbsp;Also, in our opinion, the related financial statement schedule, when considered in relation to the basic financial statements taken as a whole, presents fairly in all material respects the information set forth therein.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We also have audited, in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States), Linear Technology Corporation&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting as of July 3, 2016, based on criteria established in Internal Control-Integrated Framework issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (2013 framework) and our report dated August 25, 2016 expressed an unqualified opinion thereon.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 396PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	/s/ Ernst &amp; Young LLP
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	San Jose, California
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</EFX_AUDITORS_OPINION>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_AUDITORS_OPINION>
<A NAME="FIS_AUDITORS_OPINION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Report of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Board of Directors and Stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	holders of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Linear Technology Corporation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We have audited Linear Technology Corporation&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting as of July 3, 2016, based on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	criteria established in Internal Control&#x2014;Integrated Framework issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (2013 framework) (the COSO criteria).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Linear Technology Corporation&#x2019;s management is responsible for maintaining effective internal control over financial reporting, and for its assessment of the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting included in the accompanying Managemen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t&#x2019;s Report on Internal Control o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ver Financial Reporting. Our responsibility is to express an opinion on the company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting based on our audit.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We conducted our audit in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States). Those standards require that we plan and perform the audit to obtain reasonable assurance about whether effective internal control over financial reporting was maintained in all material respects. Our audit included obtaining an understanding of internal control over financial reporting, assessing the risk that a material weakness exists, testing and evaluating the design and operating effectiveness of internal control based on the assessed risk, and performing such other procedures as we considered necessary in the circumstances. We believe that our audit provides a reasonable basis for our opinion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	A company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting is a process designed to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles. A company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting includes those policies and procedures that (1) pertain to the maintenance of records that, in reasonable detail, accurately and fairly reflect the transactions and dispositions of the assets of the company; (2) provide reasonable assurance that transactions are recorded as necessary to permit preparation of financial statements in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, and that receipts and expenditures of the company are being made only in accordance with authorizations of management and directors of the company; and (3) provide reasonable assurance regarding prevention or timely detection of unauthorized acquisition, use, or disposition of the company&#x2019;s assets that could have a material effect on the financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Because of its inherent limitations, internal control over financial reporting may not prevent or detect misstatements. Also, projections of any evaluation of effectiveness to future periods are subject to the risk that controls may become inadequate because of changes in conditions, or that the degree of compliance with the policies or procedures may deteriorate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In our opinion, Linear Technology Corporation maintained, in all material respects, effective internal control over financial reporting as of July 3, 2016, based on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the COSO criteria.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We also have audited, in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States), the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	consolidated balance sheets of Linear Technology Corporation&nbsp;&nbsp;as of July 3, 2016 and June 28, 2015, and the related consolidated statements of income, comprehensive income, stockholders&#x2019; equity and cash flows for each of the three fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	years in the period ended July
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of Linear Technology Corporation and our report dated August 25, 2016 expressed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	an unqualified opinion thereon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 396PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	/s/ Ernst &amp; Young LLP
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	San Jose, California
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	August 25, 2016
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<EFX_ACCOUNTING_CHANGES>
<A NAME="FIS_ACCOUNTING_CHANGES"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="LLTC-20160703X10K_HTM_ITEM9CHANGESINANDDISAGREEMENTSWITHACCOUN">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITEM 9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CHANGES IN AND DISAGREEMENTS WITH ACCOUNTANTS ON ACCOUNTING AND FINANCIAL DISCLOSURE
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT: -72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_ACCOUNTING_CHANGES>
<EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>
<A NAME="FIS_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="LLTC-20160703X10K_HTM_ITEM9ACONTROLSANDPROCEEDURES">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITEM 9A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CONTROLS AND PROCEDURES
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Evaluation of Disclosure Controls and Procedures.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s management, with the participation of its Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, evaluated the effectiveness of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s disclosure controls and procedures as of the end of the period covered by this Annual Report on Form 10-K.&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this section, the term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	disclosure controls and procedures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	means controls and other procedures of an issuer that are designed to ensure that information required to be disclosed by the issuer in the reports that it files or submits under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	et seq.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	) is recorded, processed, summarized and reported within the time periods specified in the Commission
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s rules and forms.&nbsp;&nbsp;Disclosure controls and procedures include, without limitation, controls and procedures designed to ensure that information required to be disclosed by an issuer in the reports that it files or submits under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 is accumulated and communicated to the issuer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s management, including its principal executive and principal financial officers, or persons performing similar functions, as appropriate to allow timely decisions regarding required disclosure.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s management evaluated, with the participation of its Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, the effectiveness of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s disclosure controls and procedures as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	July 3, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Based on this evaluation, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer have concluded that, as of such date, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s disclosure controls and procedures are effective to ensure that information it is required to disclose in reports that it files or submits under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 is accumulated and communicated to the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s management, including its principal executive and principal financial officers, as appropriate to allow timely decisions regarding required disclosure, and that such information is recorded, processed, summarized and reported within the time periods specified in Securities and Exchange Commission rules and forms.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Changes in Internal Control over Financial Reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	No change in the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934) occurred during the quarter ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	July 3, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Managemen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	t&#x2019;s Report on Internal Control o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ver Financial Reporting
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The management of Linear Technology is responsible for establishing and maintaining adequate internal control over financial reporting as defined in Rules 13a-15(f) or 15d-15(f) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s internal control system was designed to provide reasonable assurance to the Company&#x2019;s management and Board of Directors regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation and fair presentation of financial statements issued for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	All internal control systems, no matter how well designed, have inherent limitations and may not prevent or detect misstatements. Therefore, even those systems determined to be effective can only provide reasonable assurance with respect to financial reporting reliability and financial statement preparation and presentation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s management assessed the effectiveness of its internal control over financial reporting as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	July 3, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In making this assessment, it used the criteria set forth by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations (COSO) of the Treadway Commission in Internal Control&#x2014;Integrated Framework
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. Based on its assessment of internal control over financial
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	63
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage64"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<A HREF="#LLTC-20160703X10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	reporting, management has concluded that, as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	July 3, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting is effective based on the COSO criteria.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Management&#x2019;s assessment of the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	July 3, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	has been audited by Ernst and Young LLP, an independent registered public accounting firm, as stated in their attestation report which is included herein.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	LINEAR TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ROBERT C. DOBKIN EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	This Agreement is made by and between Linear Technology Corporation (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) and Robert C. Dobkin (&#x201C;Executive&#x201D;).

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 10PT 0PT 0PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Duties and Scope of Employment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Position; Agreement Commencement Date; Duties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive&#x2019;s coverage under this Agreement shall commence upon the date this Agreement has been signed by both parties hereto (the &#x201C;Agreement Commencement Date&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;Following the Agreement Commencement Date, Executive shall continue to serve as Vice President, Engineering and Chief Technical Officer, reporting to the Chief Executive Officer.&nbsp;&nbsp;The period of Executive&#x2019;s employment hereunder is referred to herein as the &#x201C;Employment Term.&#x201D;&nbsp;&nbsp;During the Employment Term, Executive shall render such business and professional services in the performance of his duties, consistent with Executive&#x2019;s position within the Company, as shall reasonably be assigned to him by the Chief Executive Officer.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;During the Employment Term, Executive shall devote his full business efforts and time to the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive agrees, during the Employment Term, not to actively engage in any other employment, occupation or consulting activity for any direct or indirect remuneration without the prior approval of the Board of Directors of the Company (the &#x201C;Board&#x201D;);&nbsp;&nbsp;provided, however, that Executive may serve in any capacity with any civic, educational or charitable organization, or as a member of corporate Boards of Directors or committees thereof, without the approval of the Board, unless such service involves a conflict of interest with the Company&#x2019;s business.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Employee Benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;During the Employment Term, Executive shall be eligible to participate in the employee benefit plans maintained by the Company that are applicable to other senior management to the full extent provided for under those plans.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 10PT 0PT 0PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	At-Will Employment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive and the Company understand and acknowledge that Executive&#x2019;s employment with the Company constitutes &#x201C;at-will&#x201D; employment.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the Company&#x2019;s obligation to provide severance benefits as specified herein, Executive and the Company acknowledge that this employment relationship may be terminated at any time, upon written notice to the other party, with or without good cause or for any or no cause, at the option either of the Company or Executive.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 10PT 0PT 0PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Base Salary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;While employed by the Company, the Company shall pay the Executive as compensation for his services a base salary at the annualized rate of $280,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;Base Salary&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;Such salary shall be paid periodically in accordance with normal Company payroll practices and subject to the usual, required withholding.&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive&#x2019;s Base Salary shall be reviewed annually by the Compensation Committee of the Board for possible adjustments in light of Executive&#x2019;s performance and competitive data.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Bonuses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive shall be eligible to earn a target bonus under the Company&#x2019;s 1996 Senior Executive Bonus Plan as specified annually by the Compensation Committee of the Board and will also be eligible to participate in the Key Employee Incentive Bonus Plan (the target amounts under these plans, added together, are referred to herein as the &#x201C;Target Bonus&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Severance Prior to a Change of Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If, at any time prior to a Change of Control (as defined herein), Executive&#x2019;s employment with the Company terminates due to (i) a voluntary termination for &#x201C;Good Reason&#x201D; (as defined herein) where the grounds for the Good Reason are not cured by the Company within 90 days following receipt of written notice specifying the grounds from Executive, or (ii) an involuntary termination by the Company other than for &#x201C;Cause&#x201D; (as defined herein), then, subject to Executive executing and not revoking a standard form of mutual release of claims with the Company and not breaching the terms of Section 11 hereof, (i)&nbsp;all of Executive&#x2019;s Company stock options and restricted stock shall immediately accelerate vesting as to the amount of shares as would have vested had Executive remained employed by the Company an additional six months, (ii)&nbsp;Executive shall
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage71"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	receive continued payments of six month&#x2019;s Base Salary plus 50% of his Target Bonus, less applicable withholding, in accordance with the Company&#x2019;s standard payroll practices (the &#x201C;Severance Payment&#x201D;), (iii)&nbsp;the Company shall pay the group health and dental plan continuation coverage premiums for Executive and his covered dependents under Title X of the Consolidated Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985, as amended (&#x201C;COBRA&#x201D;) for the lesser of (A)&nbsp;six (6) months from the date of Executive&#x2019;s termination of employment, or (B)&nbsp;the date upon which Executive and his covered dependents are covered by similar plans of Executive&#x2019;s new employer (the &#x201C;COBRA Coverage&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	For purposes of this Agreement, &#x201C;Cause&#x201D; shall mean (i)&nbsp;an act of personal dishonesty taken by Executive in connection with his responsibilities as an employee and intended to result in substantial personal enrichment of Executive, (ii)&nbsp;Executive being convicted of, or plea of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	nolo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	contendere
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	to, a felony, (iii)&nbsp;a willful act by Executive which constitutes gross misconduct and which is injurious to the Company, (iv)&nbsp;following delivery to Executive of a written demand for performance from the Company which describes the basis for the Company&#x2019;s reasonable belief that Executive has not substan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	tially performed his duties, continued violations by Executive of Executive&#x2019;s obligations to the Company which are demonstrably willful and deliberate on Executive&#x2019;s part.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	For purposes of this Agreement, &#x201C;Good Reason&#x201D; means, without Executive's express consent, (i) a material reduc
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	tion of Executive's duties, title, authority or responsibilities, relative to Executive's duties, title, authority or responsibilities as in effect immediately prior to such reduction, or the assignment to Executive of such reduced duties, title, authority or responsibilities (ii)&nbsp;a material reduction, of the facilities and perquisites (including office space and loca
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	tion) available to Executive immediately prior to such reduc
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	tion, other than a reduction generally applicable to all senior management of the Company; (iii)&nbsp;a reduction by the Company in the Base Salary of Executive as in effect immediately prior to such reduction (other than a reduction that generally applies to Company employees); (iv)&nbsp;a material reduction by the Company in the aggregate level of employee benefits, including Target Bonuses, to which Executive was entitled immediately prior to such reduction with the result that Executive's aggregate benefits package is materially reduced(other than a reduction that generally applies to Company employees); (v)&nbsp;the relocation of Executive to a facil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	ity or a location more than thirty-five (35) miles from Executive's then present location; or (vi)&nbsp;any act or set of facts or circumstances which would, under California case law or statute constitute a constructive termination of Executive.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:37.4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	For purposes of this Agreement, &#x201C;Change of Control&#x201D; shall mean the occurrence of any of the following events in either a single transaction or a series of related transactions:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:116PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Any &#x201C;person&#x201D; (as such term is used in Sec
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	tions&nbsp;13(d) and 14(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended) becomes the &#x201C;beneficial owner&#x201D; (as defined in Rule&nbsp;13d-3 under said Act), directly or indirectly, of securi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	ties of the Company representing fifty percent (50%) or more of the total voting power represented by the Company's then outstand
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	ing voting securities; or
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

</P>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:115PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The consummation of the sale or disposition by the Company of all or substantially all the Company's assets; or
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:113PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The consummation of a merger or consolidation of the Company with any other corpora
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	tion, other than a merger or consolidation which would result in the voting securities of the Company outstanding immediately prior thereto continuing to represent (either by remaining out
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	standing or by being converted into voting securities of the surviving entity) at least fifty percent (50%) of the total voting power represented by the voting securities of the Company or such surviving entity outstanding immediately after such merger or consolidation; or
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:112PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	A change in the composition of the Board occurring within a two-year period, as a result of which fewer than a majority of the directors are Incumbent Directors.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#x201C;Incumbent Directors&#x201D; shall mean directors who either (A)&nbsp;are directors of the Company as of the date upon which this Agreement was entered into, or (B)&nbsp;are elected, or nominated for election, to the Board with the affirmative votes of at least a majority of those directors whose election or nomination was not in connection with any transaction described in subsections (i), (ii), or (iii) above, or in connection with an actual or threatened proxy contest relating to the election of directors to the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Executive shall not be required to mitigate the value of any severance benefits contemplated by this section, nor shall any such benefits be reduced by any earnings or benefits that the Executive may
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
