<A NAME="eolPage72"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	receive from any other source; provided, however, that if Executive receives severance benefits hereunder, he expressly waives the right to receive severance benefits under any other severance plan or policy of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Severance on or Following a Change of Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If, on or after a Change of Control (as defined herein), Executive&#x2019;s employment with the Company terminates due to (i) a voluntary termination for &#x201C;Good Reason&#x201D; (as defined herein) where the grounds for the Good Reason are not cured by the Company within 30 days following receipt of written notice specifying the grounds from Executive, or (ii) an involuntary termination by the Company other than for &#x201C;Cause&#x201D; (as defined herein), then, subject to Executive executing and not revoking a standard form of mutual release of claims with the Company and not breaching the terms of Section 11 hereof, (i)&nbsp;all of Executive&#x2019;s Company stock options and restricted stock shall immediately accelerate vesting as to 50% of the then unvested shares, (ii)&nbsp;Executive shall receive continued payments of one year&#x2019;s Base Salary plus 50% of his Target Bonus, less applicable withholding, in accordance with the Company&#x2019;s standard payroll practices (the &#x201C;Severance Payment&#x201D;), (iii)&nbsp;the Company shall pay the group health and dental plan continuation coverage premiums for Executive and his covered dependents under Title X of the Consolidated Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985, as amended (&#x201C;COBRA&#x201D;) for the lesser of (A)&nbsp;twelve (12) months from the date of Executive&#x2019;s termination of employment, or (B)&nbsp;the date upon which Executive and his covered dependents are covered by similar plans of Executive&#x2019;s new employer (the &#x201C;COBRA Coverage&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Executive shall not be required to mitigate the value of any severance benefits contemplated by this section, nor shall any such benefits be reduced by any earnings or benefits that the Executive may receive from any other source; provided, however, that if Executive receives severance benefits hereunder, he expressly waives the right to receive severance benefits under any other severance plan or policy of the Company.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Voluntary Termination Other than for Good Reason; Involuntary Termination for Cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that Executive terminates his employment voluntarily other than for Good Reason or is involuntarily terminated by the Company for Cause, then all vesting of Executive&#x2019;s stock options and restricted stock shall terminate immediately and all payments of compensation by the Company to Executive hereunder shall immediately terminate (except as to amounts already earned).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 10PT 0PT 0PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Death or Total Disability of Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Death
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon Executive&#x2019;s death while Executive is an employee or consultant of the Company, then (i) employment hereunder shall automatically terminate, (ii) all of Executive&#x2019;s Company stock options and restricted stock shall immediately accelerate vesting as to 50% of the then unvested shares, and all subsequent vesting of Executive&#x2019;s stock options and restricted stock shall terminate immediately, and (iii) all payments of compensation by the Company to Executive hereunder shall immediately terminate (except as to amounts already earned).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Disability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon Executive&#x2019;s becoming permanently and totally disabled (as defined in accordance with Internal Revenue Code Section&nbsp;22(e)(3) or its successor provision) while Executive is an employee or consultant of the Company, then employment hereunder shall automatically terminate and all payments of compensation by the Company to Executive hereunder shall immediately terminate (except as to amounts already earned), and all vesting of Executive&#x2019;s stock options and restricted stock shall terminate immediately.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

</FONT>

<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage73"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 10PT 0PT 0PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Golden Parachute Excise Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:52PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:NUM">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Parachute Payments of Less than 3.59 x Base Amount
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that the benefits provided for in this agreement or otherwise payable to Executive (a)&nbsp;constitute &#x201C;parachute payments&#x201D; within the meaning of Section 280G of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the &#x201C;Code&#x201D;), (b)&nbsp;would be subject to the excise tax imposed by Section 4999 of the Code, and (c) the aggregate value of such parachute payments, as determined in accordance with Section 280G of the Code and the proposed Treasury Regulations thereunder (or the final Treasury Regulations, if they have then been adopted) is less than the product obtained by multiplying 3.59 by Executive&#x2019;s &#x201C;base amount&#x201D; within the meaning of Code Section 280G(b)(3), then such benefits shall be reduced to the extent necessary (but only to that extent) so that no portion of such benefits will be subject to excise tax under Section 4999 of the Code.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:52PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:NUM">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Parachute Payments Equal to or Greater than 3.59 x Base Amount
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that the benefits provided for in this agreement or otherwise payable to Executive (a)&nbsp;constitute &#x201C;parachute payments&#x201D; within the meaning of Section 280G of the Code, (b)&nbsp;would be subject to the excise tax imposed by Section 4999 of the Code, and (c) the aggregate value of such parachute payments, as determined in accordance with Section 280G of the Code and the proposed Treasury Regulations thereunder (or the final Treasury Regulations, if they have then been adopted) is equal to or greater than the product obtained by multiplying 3.59 by Executive&#x2019;s &#x201C;base amount&#x201D; within the meaning of Code Section 280G(b)(3), then the Executive shall receive (i)&nbsp;a payment from the Company sufficient to pay such excise tax, plus (ii)&nbsp;an additional payment from the Company sufficient to pay the excise tax and federal and state income and employment taxes arising from the payments made by the Company to Executive pursuant to this sentence.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	280G Determinations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Unless the Company and the Executive otherwise agree in writing, the determination of Executive&#x2019;s excise tax liability and the amount required to be paid or reduced under this Section 5 shall be made in writing by the Company&#x2019;s independent auditors who are primarily used by the Company immediately prior to the Change of Control (the &#x201C;Accountants&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of making the calculations required by this Section&nbsp;5, the Accountants may make reasonable assumptions and approximations concerning applicable taxes and may rely on reasonable, good faith interpretations concerning the application of Sections 280G and 4999 of the Code.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company and the Executive shall furnish to the Accountants such information and documents as the Accountants may reasonably request in order to make a determination under this Section.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company shall bear all costs the Accountants may reasonably incur in connection with any calculations contemplated by this Section 5.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 10PT 0PT 0PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Assignment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of (a)&nbsp;the heirs, beneficiaries, executors and legal representatives of Executive upon Executive&#x2019;s death and (b)&nbsp;any successor of the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any such successor of the Company shall be deemed substituted for the Company under the terms of this Agreement for all purposes.&nbsp;&nbsp;As used herein, &#x201C;successor&#x201D; shall include any person, firm, corporation or other business entity which at any time, whether by purchase, merger or otherwise, directly or indirectly acquires all or substantially all of the assets or business of the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;None of the rights of Executive to receive any form of compensation payable pursuant to this Agreement shall be assignable or transferable except through a testamentary disposition or by the laws of descent and distribution upon the death of Executive.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any attempted assignment, transfer, conveyance or other disposition (other than as aforesaid) of any interest in the rights of Executive to receive any form of compensation hereunder shall be null and void.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>

</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 10PT 0PT 0PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;All notices, requests, demands and other communications called for hereunder shall be in writing and shall be deemed given if (i)&nbsp;delivered personally or by facsimile, (ii)&nbsp;one (1) day after being sent by Federal Express or a similar commercial overnight service, or (iii)&nbsp;three (3) days after being mailed by registered or certified mail, return receipt requested, prepaid and addressed to the parties or their successors in interest at the following addresses, or at such other addresses as the parties may designate by written notice in the manner aforesaid:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 10PT 0PT 0PT;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Severability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that any provision hereof becomes or is declared by a court of competent jurisdiction to be illegal, unenforceable or void, this Agreement shall continue in full force and effect without said provision.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 10PT 0PT 0PT;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Entire Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement, the Confidential Information and Invention Assignment Agreement previously entered into by and between the Company and Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the indemnification agreement previously entered into by and between the Company and Executive represent the entire agreement and understanding between the Company and Executive concerning Executive&#x2019;s employment relationship with the Company, and supersede and replace any and all prior agreements and understandings concerning Executive&#x2019;s employment relationship with the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 5PT 0PT 0PT;">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Dispute Resolution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The parties shall first meet to settle any dispute through good faith negotiation or non-binding mediation.&nbsp;&nbsp;If not settled by good faith negotiation or non-binding mediation between the parties within 30 days from the date one party requests in writing to meet the other party, then to the extent permitted by law, any dispute or controversy arising out of, relating to, or in connection with this Agreement, or the interpretation, validity, construction, performance, breach, or termination thereof shall be finally settled by binding arbitration to be held in Santa Clara County, California, in accordance with the National Rules for the Resolution of Employment Disputes then in effect of the American Arbitration Association (the &#x201C;Rules&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;The arbitrator may grant injunctions or other relief in such dispute or controversy.&nbsp;&nbsp;The decision of the arbitrator shall be confidential, final, conclusive and binding on the parties to the arbitration.&nbsp;&nbsp;Judgment may be entered under a protective order on the arbitrator&#x2019;s decision in any court having jurisdiction.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company shall pay all costs of any mediation or arbitration; provided, however, that each party shall pay its own attorney and advisor fees.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The arbitrator shall apply California law to the merits of any dispute or claim, without reference to rules of conflict of law.&nbsp;&nbsp;The arbitration proceedings shall be governed by federal arbitration law and by the Rules, without reference to state arbitration law.&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive hereby expressly consents to the personal jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in California for any action or proceeding arising from or relating to this Agreement and/or relating to any arbitration in which the parties are participants.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive understands that nothing in Section&nbsp;10 modifies Executive&#x2019;s at-will status.&nbsp;&nbsp;Either the Company or Executive can terminate the employment relationship at any time, with or without cause.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	EXECUTIVE HAS READ AND UNDERSTANDS SECTION&nbsp;10, WHICH DISCUSSES ARBITRATION.&nbsp;&nbsp;EXECUTIVE UNDERSTANDS THAT BY SIGNING THIS AGREEMENT, EXECUTIVE AGREES, TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, TO SUBMIT ANY FUTURE CLAIMS ARISING OUT OF, RELATING TO, OR IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT, OR THE INTERPRETATION, VALIDITY, CONSTRUCTION, PERFORMANCE, BREACH, OR TERMINATION THEREOF TO BINDING ARBITRATION, AND THAT THIS ARBITRATION CLAUSE CONSTITUTES A WAIVER OF EXECUTIVE&#x2019;S RIGHT TO A JURY TRIAL AND RELATES TO THE RESOLUTION OF ALL DISPUTES RELATING TO ALL ASPECTS OF THE EMPLOYER/EMPLOYEE RELATIONSHIP.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Covenants Not to Compete and Not to Solicit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Covenant Not to Compete
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	. If and only if Executive receives severance benefits under either Section 3(c) or 3(d) hereof, then Executive agrees that, until the end of the six or twelve month severance benefits period, as applicable, following the date of his termination of employment with the Company for any reason or no reason, Executive will not directly engage in (whether as an employee, consultant, proprietor, partner, director or otherwise), or have any ownership interest in, or participate in the financing, operation, management or control of, any person, firm, corporation or business that engages or participates anywhere in the world in providing goods and services similar to those provided by the Company upon the date of Executive&#x2019;s termination of employment.&nbsp;&nbsp;Ownership of less than 3% of the outstanding voting stock of a corporation or other entity will not constitute a violation of this provision.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company agrees not to unreasonably withhold consent from Executive to engage in any activity that is not competitive with the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage75"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Covenant Not to Solicit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If and only if Executive receives severance benefits under either Section 3(c) or 3(d) hereof, then Executive agrees that he&nbsp;will not, at any time during the six or twelve month severance benefits period, as applicable, following his termination date, directly or indirectly solicit any individuals to leave the Company&#x2019;s employ for any reason or interfere in any other manner with the employment relationships at the time existing between the Company and its current or prospective employees.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Representations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties intend that the covenants contained in Section&nbsp;11(a) and (b) shall be construed as a series of separate covenants, one for each county, city and state (or analogous entity) and country of the world.&nbsp;&nbsp;If, in any judicial proceeding, a court shall refuse to enforce any of the separate covenants, or any part thereof, then such unenforceable covenant, or such part thereof, shall be deemed eliminated from this Agreement for the purpose of those proceedings to the extent necessary to permit the remaining separate covenants, or portions thereof, to be enforced.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Reformation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that the provisions of this Section&nbsp;11 should ever be deemed to exceed the time or geographic limitations, or scope of this covenant, permitted by applicable law, then such provisions shall be reformed to the maximum time or geographic limitations, as the case may be, permitted by applicable laws.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Reasonableness of Covenants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive represents that he (i)&nbsp;is familiar with the covenants not to compete and solicit, and (ii)&nbsp;is fully aware of his obligations hereunder, including, without limitation, the reasonableness of the length of time, scope and geographic coverage of these covenants.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Remedy for Breach by Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event Executive breaches his obligations under this Section 11, the sole remedy shall be that the Company may thereafter discontinue providing the severance benefits under Section 3(c) or 3(d) hereof that Executive would otherwise receive.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 5PT 0PT 0PT;">
	12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	No Oral Modification, Cancellation or Discharge
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement may only be amended, canceled or discharged in writing signed by Executive and the Chairman of the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 5PT 0PT 0PT;">
	13.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Withholding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company shall be entitled to withhold, or cause to be withheld, from payment any amount of withholding taxes required by law with respect to payments made to Executive in connection with his employment hereunder.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 5PT 0PT 0PT;">
	14.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Governing Law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of California.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 5PT 0PT 0PT;">
	15.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement is effective upon the date it has been executed by both parties.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive acknowledges that he has had the opportunity to discuss this matter with and obtain advice from his private attorney, has had sufficient time to, and has carefully read and fully understands all the provisions of this Agreement, and is knowingly and voluntarily entering into this Agreement.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage77"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AMENDMENT TO ROBERT C. DOBKIN EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This amendment (the &#x201C;Amendment&#x201D;) is made by and between Robert C. Dobkin (&#x201C;Executive&#x201D;) and Linear Technology Corporation (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D; and together with Executive hereinafter collectively referred to as the &#x201C;Parties&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	WHEREAS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Parties previously entered into the Robert C. Dobkin Employment Agreement effective as of January 15, 2002 (the &#x201C;Agreement&#x201D;); and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	WHEREAS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Parties wish to amend the Agreement in order to bring such terms into compliance with Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended and the final regulations and other official guidance thereunder, as set forth below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	NOW, THEREFORE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, for good and valuable consideration, the Parties agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 64PT 0PT 0PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The first paragraph of Section 3(c) of the Agreement is hereby amended in its entirety as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Severance Prior to a Change of Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If, at any time prior to a Change of Control (as defined&nbsp;&nbsp;herein), Executive&#x2019;s employment with the Company terminates due to (i) a voluntary termination for &#x201C;Good Reason&#x201D; (as defined herein) where the grounds for the Good Reason are not cured by the Company within 90 days following receipt of written notice specifying the grounds from Executive, or (ii) an involuntary termination by the Company other than for &#x201C;Cause&#x201D; (as defined herein), then, subject to Executive executing and not revoking a standard form of mutual release of claims with the Company provided that such release of claims becomes effective no later than sixty (60) days following the termination date (such deadline, the &#x201C;Release Deadline&#x201D;) and not breaching the terms of Section 11 hereof and further subject to Sections 3(g) and (h), (i) all of Executive&#x2019;s Company stock options and restricted stock shall immediately accelerate vesting as to the amount of shares as would have vested had Executive remained employed by the Company an additional six months, (ii)&nbsp;Executive shall receive continued payments of six month&#x2019;s Base Salary plus 50% of his Target Bonus, less applicable withholding, in accordance with the Company&#x2019;s standard payroll practices, and (iii) if Executive elects continuation coverage pursuant to the Consolidated Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985, as amended (&#x201C;COBRA&#x201D;) for Executive and Executive&#x2019;s dependents, within the time period prescribed pursuant to COBRA, the Company shall reimburse Executive for the COBRA premiums for such coverage for Executive and his covered dependents for the lesser of (A)&nbsp;six (6) months from the date of Executive&#x2019;s termination of employment, or (B) the date upon which Executive and his covered dependents are covered by similar plans of Executive&#x2019;s new employer.&nbsp;&nbsp;COBRA reimbursements shall be made by the Company to Executive consistent with the Company&#x2019;s normal expense reimbursement policy.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 64PT 0PT 0PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The first paragraph of Section 3(e) of the Agreement is hereby amended in its entirety as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Severance on or Following a Change of Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If, on or after a Change of Control (as defined herein), Executive&#x2019;s&nbsp;&nbsp;employment with the Company terminates due to (i) a voluntary termination for &#x201C;Good Reason&#x201D; (as defined herein) where the grounds&nbsp;&nbsp;for the Good Reason are not cured by the Company within 30 days following receipt of written notice specifying&nbsp;&nbsp;the grounds from Executive, or (ii) an involuntary termination by the Company other than for &#x201C;Cause&#x201D; (as defined herein), then, subject to Executive executing and not revoking a standard form of mutual release of claims with the Company effective no later than the Release Deadline and not breaching the terms of Section 11 hereof and further subject to Sections 3(g) and 3(h), (i) all of Executive&#x2019;s Company stock options and restricted stock shall immediately accelerate vesting as to 50% of the then unvested shares, (ii) Executive shall receive continued payments of one year&#x2019;s Base Salary plus 50% of his Target&nbsp;&nbsp;Bonus, less applicable withholding, in accordance with the Company&#x2019;s standard payroll practices, (iii) if Executive elects continuation coverage pursuant to COBRA for Executive and Executive&#x2019;s dependents, within the time period prescribed pursuant to COBRA, the Company shall reimburse Executive for the COBRA premiums for such coverage for Executive and his covered dependents
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage78"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for the lesser of (A)&nbsp;twelve (12) months from the date of Executive&#x2019;s termination of employment, or (B) the date upon which Executive and his covered dependents are covered by similar plans of Executive&#x2019;s new employer.&nbsp;&nbsp;COBRA reimbursements shall be made by the Company to Executive consistent with the Company&#x2019;s normal expense reimbursement policy.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 64PT 0PT 0PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The following Sections 3(g) and 3(h) are hereby added to the Agreement:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 72PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;(g)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Timing of Payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:44PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	In no event shall severance payments or benefits be paid or provided until the mutual release of claims actually becomes effective and irrevocable.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any severance payments or benefits under this Agreement that would be considered Deferred Compensation Severance Benefits (as defined in Section 3(h)) shall be paid on, or, in the case of installments, shall not commence until, the sixtieth (60th) day following Executive&#x2019;s separation from service, or, if later, such time as required by Section 3(h).&nbsp;&nbsp;Any installment payments that would have been made to Executive during the sixty (60) day period immediately following Executive&#x2019;s separation from service but for the preceding sentence shall be paid to Executive on the sixtieth (60th) day following Executive&#x2019;s separation from service and the remaining payments shall be made as provided in this Agreement.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:43PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Unless otherwise required by Section 3(h), the Company shall pay any severance payments in continuing payments following Executive&#x2019;s termination date; provided, however, that no severance or other benefits shall be paid or provided until the mutual release of claims becomes effective, and any severance amounts or benefits otherwise payable between Executive&#x2019;s termination date and the date such release becomes effective shall be paid on the effective date of such release.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Executive should die before all of the severance amounts have been paid, such unpaid amounts shall be paid in a lump-sum payment promptly following such event to Executive&#x2019;s designated beneficiary, if living, or otherwise to the personal representative of Executive&#x2019;s estate.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	(h)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 409A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:44PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, no severance payable to Executive, if any, pursuant to this Agreement, when considered together with any other severance payments or separation benefits that are considered deferred compensation under Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the &#x201C;Code&#x201D;) and the final regulations and any guidance promulgated thereunder (&#x201C;Section 409A&#x201D;) (together, the &#x201C;Deferred Compensation Separation Benefits&#x201D;) shall be payable until Executive has a &#x201C;separation from service&#x201D; within the meaning of Section 409A.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:43PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, if Executive is a &#x201C;specified employee&#x201D; within the meaning of Section 409A at the time of Executive&#x2019;s termination (other than due to death), then the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Deferred Compensation Separation Benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	that are payable within the first six (6) months following Executive&#x2019;s separation from service shall become payable on the first payroll date that occurs on or after the date six (6) months and one (1) day following the date of Executive&#x2019;s separation from service.&nbsp;&nbsp;All subsequent Deferred Compensation Separation Benefits, if any, shall be payable in accordance with the payment schedule applicable to each payment or benefit.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, if Executive dies following Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	separation from service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	but prior to the six (6) month anniversary of the separation, then any payments delayed in accordance with this paragraph shall be payable in a lump sum as soon as administratively practicable after the date of Executive&#x2019;s death and all other Deferred Compensation Separation Benefits shall be payable in accordance with the payment schedule applicable to each payment or benefit.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each payment and benefit payable under this Agreement is intended to constitute separate payments for purposes of Section 1.409A-2(b)(2) of the Treasury Regulations.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage79"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:41PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Any amount paid under this Agreement that satisfies the requirements of the &#x201C;short-term deferral&#x201D; rule set forth in Section 1.409A-1(b)(4) of the Treasury Regulations shall not constitute Deferred Compensation Separation Benefits for purposes of clause (i) above.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:40PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Any amount paid under this Agreement that qualifies as a payment made as a result of an involuntary separation from service pursuant to Section&nbsp;1.409A-1(b)(9)(iii) of the Treasury Regulations that do not exceed the Section 409A Limit shall not constitute Deferred Compensation Separation Benefits for purposes of clause (i) above.
</FONT>
<A NAME="LLTC-20160703XEX10_52_HTM__DV_M51">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;For purposes of this Agreement, &#x201C;Section 409A Limit&#x201D; means the lesser of 2 times: (i) Executive&#x2019;s annualized compensation based upon the annual rate of pay paid to Executive during Executive&#x2019;s taxable year preceding Executive&#x2019;s taxable year of Executive&#x2019;s termination of employment as determined under Treasury Regulation 1.409A-1(b)(9)(iii)(A)(1) and any Internal Revenue Service guidance issued with respect thereto; or&nbsp;(ii) the maximum amount that may be taken into account under a qualified plan pursuant to Section&nbsp;401(a)(17) of the Internal Revenue Code for the year in which Executive&#x2019;s employment is terminated.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:42PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(v)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The foregoing provisions are intended to comply with the requirements of Section 409A so that none of the severance payments and benefits to be provided hereunder shall be subject to the additional tax imposed under Section 409A, and any ambiguities herein shall be interpreted to so comply.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company and Executive agree to work together in good faith to consider amendments to this Agreement and to take such reasonable actions which are necessary, appropriate or desirable to avoid imposition of any additional tax or income recognition prior to actual payment to Executive under Section 409A.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 64PT 0PT 0PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 5 of the Agreement is hereby amended the following new sentence to the end of subsection (a):
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;If a reduction in benefits constituting &#x201C;parachute payments&#x201D; is necessary so that no portion of such benefits shall be subject to excise tax under Section 4999 of the Code, reduction shall occur in the following order: reduction of cash payments; cancellation of awards granted &#x201C;contingent on a change in ownership or control&#x201D; (within the meaning of Code Section 280G), cancellation of accelerated vesting of equity awards; reduction of employee benefits.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that acceleration of vesting of equity award compensation is to be reduced, such acceleration of vesting will be cancelled in the reverse order of the date of grant of Executive&#x2019;s equity awards.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 64PT 0PT 0PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 11(a) of the Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and the remaining subsections of Section 11 are re-numbered to account for the deletion of Section 11(a) and any references to Section11 (and any subsections thereof) in the Agreement are hereby amended accordingly.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 64PT 0PT 0PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Amendment, taken together with the Agreement, to the extent not modified by this Amendment, supersedes any and all previous contracts, arrangements or understandings between the parties with respect to the Agreement, and may not be amended adversely to Executive&#x2019;s interest except by mutual written agreement of the Parties.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 64PT 0PT 0PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Agreement will become effective on the date that it is signed by the Company (the &#x201C;Effective Date&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, each of the Parties has executed this Amendment, in the case of the Company by its duly authorized officer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	SECOND AMENDMENT TO ROBERT C. DOBKIN EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This second amendment (the &#x201C;Amendment&#x201D;) is made by and between Robert C. Dobkin (&#x201C;Executive&#x201D;) and Linear Technology Corporation (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D; and together with Executive hereinafter collectively referred to as the &#x201C;Parties&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	WHEREAS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Parties previously entered into the Robert C. Dobkin Employment Agreement effective as of January 15, 2002, as amended pursuant to the &#x201C;Amendment to Robert C. Dobkin Employment Agreement&#x201D; entered into between the Parties and dated December 30, 2008 (together, the &#x201C;Agreement&#x201D;); and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	WHEREAS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Parties wish to amend the Agreement to provide Executive Change of Control severance benefits consistent with those offered to other executives of the Company in exchange for Executive agreeing to forfeit his right to receive a tax gross-up for excise taxes imposed under Section 4999 of the Code as a result of receiving certain excess parachute payments within the meaning of Section 280G of the Code.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	NOW, THEREFORE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, for good and valuable consideration, the Parties agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The first paragraph of Section 3(c) of the Agreement is hereby amended in its entirety as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Severance Prior to a Change of Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If, at any time prior to a Change of Control (as defined&nbsp;&nbsp;herein), Executive&#x2019;s employment with the Company terminates due to (i) a voluntary termination for &#x201C;Good Reason&#x201D; (as defined herein) where the grounds for the Good Reason are not cured by the Company within 90 days following receipt of written notice specifying the grounds from Executive, or (ii) an involuntary termination by the Company other than for &#x201C;Cause&#x201D; (as defined herein), then, subject to Executive executing and not revoking a standard form of mutual release of claims with the Company provided that such release of claims becomes effective no later than sixty (60) days following the termination date (such deadline, the &#x201C;Release Deadline&#x201D;) and not breaching the terms of Section 11 hereof and further subject to Sections 3(g) and (h):
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 26PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	all of Executive&#x2019;s Equity Awards shall (A) immediately accelerate vesting as to the amount of shares as would have vested had Executive remained employed by the Company an additional six months; (B) in the case of stock options and stock appreciation rights, will become exercisable; and (C) in the case of Equity Awards with performance-based vesting, all performance goals and other vesting criteria will be treated as set forth in Executive&#x2019;s Equity Award agreement governing such Equity Award,
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 25PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive shall receive continued payments of six month&#x2019;s Base Salary plus 50% of his Bonus Amount, less applicable withholding, in accordance with the Company&#x2019;s standard payroll practices, and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 18PT 12PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 23PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	if Executive elects continuation coverage pursuant to the Consolidated Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985, as amended (&#x201C;COBRA&#x201D;) for Executive and Executive&#x2019;s dependents, within the time period prescribed pursuant to COBRA, the Company shall reimburse Executive for the COBRA premiums for such coverage for Executive and his covered dependents until the earlier of (A)&nbsp;six (6) months from the date of Executive&#x2019;s termination of employment; (B) the date upon which Executive and his covered dependents are covered by similar plans of Executive&#x2019;s new employer; or (C) the date upon which Executive ceases to be eligible for coverage under COBRA (such reimbursements, the &#x201C;COBRA Premiums&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;COBRA reimbursements shall be made by the Company to Executive consistent with the Company&#x2019;s normal expense reimbursement policy.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, if the Company determines in its sole discretion that it cannot pay the COBRA Premiums without potentially violating applicable law (including, without limitation, Section 2716 of the Public Health Service Act), the Company will in lieu thereof provide to Executive a taxable lump-sum payment in an amount equal to the monthly COBRA premium that Executive would be required to pay to continue Executive&#x2019;s group health coverage in effect on the date of Executive&#x2019;s termination of employment (which amount will be based on the premium for
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
